data.comment: Today's referee, Mikael Lesage, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Metz.
In the minute 1, Abdou Diallo (PSG) gets a yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
PSG's Angel Di Maria misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, PSG's Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Metz, close to PSG's area.
In the minute 8, PSG pushes forward through Angel Di Maria, whose finish on goal is saved.
PSG needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, PSG's Mauro Icardi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Metz have a goal kick.
PSG drives forward and Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to PSG.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Attention is being given to Metzâ€™s Alexandre Oukidja and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alexandre Oukidja is back on his feet again.
Mikael Lesage awards Metz a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside PSG's half?
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Metz.
In the minute 22, Julian Draxler for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Metz at Parc des Princes.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In Paris Metz drive forward through Farid Boulaya. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 28, PSG to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG's Ander Herrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Metz.
Mikael Lesage signals a PSG throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 32, PSG are pushing forward but Pablo Sarabia's finish is wide of the goal.
Metz have a goal kick.
Mauro Icardi's header is off-target for PSG.
In the minute 33, Mikael Lesage awards Metz a goal kick.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Paris.
In the minute 34, Metz have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
PSG needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in PSG.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Metz in the half of PSG.
Throw-in for Metz at Parc des Princes.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Metz at Parc des Princes.
Idrissa Gueye gets his shot on target but fails to score for PSG.
PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
Pablo Sarabia for PSG drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Paris.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Metz will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from PSG.
In the minute 43, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 44, Mikael Lesage awards Metz a goal kick.
PSG drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
The first-half is over at Parc des Princes.
The second half has started at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 46, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Metz's Habib Maiga has been booked in Paris.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Metz to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside PSG's half?
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a Metz throw-in in PSG's half.
Throw-in PSG.
In the minute 53, PSG have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Abdou Diallo of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 56, At Parc des Princes, Julian Draxler has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Paris to check on Fabien Centtonze, who is grimacing with pain.
Fabien Centtonze has recovered and rejoins the match in Paris.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Metz at Parc des Princes.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Metz.
Fabien Centtonze (Metz) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Mikael Lesage signals a Metz throw-in in PSG's half.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team have replaced Mitchel Bakker with Juan Bernat. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Tuchel.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Metz.
At Parc des Princes, Abdou Diallo has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 66, Throw-in PSG.
PSG to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a second substitution, with Presnel Kimpembe replacing Pablo Sarabia.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 71, Mikael Lesage awards Metz a goal kick.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 72, PSG's Ander Herrera attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 73, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Metz.
The away team replace Habib Diallo with Opa Nguette.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
PSG's Mauro Icardi gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Mauro Icardi for PSG drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Paris PSG attack through Angel Di Maria. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Metz at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 81, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Youssef Maziz is on a sub for Farid Boulaya for Metz.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Metz in the half of PSG.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Vincent Hognon is making the team's third substitution at Parc des Princes with Thierry Ambrose replacing Ibrahima Niane.
PSG are coming forward and Colin Dagba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Metz at Parc des Princes.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
PSG make their third substitution with Bandiougou Fadiga replacing Idrissa Gueye.
In the minute 85, Mikael Lesage waits before resuming play because Juan Bernat for PSG is still down.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Victorien Angban is replacing Vincent Pajot for the away team.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for PSG!
PSG's Angel Di Maria breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 88, PSG's Juan Bernat is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 89, Metz to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
At Parc des Princes the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Metz are coming forward and Youssef Maziz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Mikael Lesage awards PSG a goal kick.
At Parc des Princes, Metz are penalized for being offside.
That's full-time at Parc des Princes. The final score is 1-0.
Goal! Julian Draxler heads PSG into a 1-0 lead.
